alert.note: Alert for Chattahoochee; Harris; Muscogee; Talbot; Taylor (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 7:59PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Marion, northeastern Muscogee, northeastern Chattahoochee, central Schley, Talbot, southwestern Taylor and eastern Harris Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 758 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Hamilton to Baughville to near Buena Vista, and moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Buena Vista, Hamilton, Talbotton, Pine Mountain, Waverly Hall, Woodland, Junction City, Geneva, Upatoi, Brantley, Shiloh, Ellerslie, Murrays Crossroads, F.d. Roosevelt State Park, Juniper, Cataula, Rupert, Baughville, Oakland and Zellobee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
